0.name: Time
0.description: Returns the time elapsed from scenario starting, in seconds.

1.name: Speed
1.description: Returns the speed of the vehicle in kilometers per hour. The value is negative if the vehicle is driving in reverse.

2.name: Position X
2.description: Returns x of specified vehicle rear axle center position vector in the terrain database referential. This function works on interactive and autonomous vehicles.

3.name: Position Y
3.description: Returns y of specified vehicle rear axle center position vector in the terrain database referential. This function works on interactive and autonomous vehicles.

4.name: Channel
4.description: Returns the parameter value contained in specified export channel. Default output from unused channel is 0
